#summary OpenPGM 2 : C Reference : pgm_iovec
#labels Phase-Implementation

_Type_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/pgm.h>

struct pgm_iovec {
#ifdef G_OS_UNIX
	void*		iov_base;
	size_t		iov_len;	/* length of data */
#else
	u_long		iov_len;
	char*		iov_base;
#endif /* G_OS_WIN32 */
};
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
A scatter/gather message vector.

=== Remarks ===
On Windows platforms <tt>pgm_iovec</tt> is compatible with <tt>[http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms741542(VS.85).aspx WSABUF]</tt>, on Unix is compatible with <tt>struct iovec</tt>.
